casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. CHIN LOY, the Father of Chin Nom Ow, Relator-Appellant, v. Rudolph REIMER, etc., Respondent-Appellee. No. 330. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 6, 1938. Giden & Giden, of New York City (A. Arthur Giden, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lámar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Robert L. Werner, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
